mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY CODE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (CODE, ID, REGDATE, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, BOARDGROUP, COMMENTSTEP, COMMNETINDENT) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{content}, 0, BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET ID = #{id}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE CODE = #{code}
